On Wed, Sep 16, 2009 at 7:03 PM, Subbu Allamaraju <subbu@...> wrote:

> What has Atom got to do with message queues or pub/sub? It is a format. It
> does not specify any protocol.


Quite right. I am using it here as a format to provide a list of items that
may be processed. It's not a true message queue, but neither is the example
a true transaction. Different paradigms often make it difficult to explain a
clear transition, which was really my point. :)


Ryan Riley
ryan.riley@...
http://panesofglass.org/
http://wizardsofsmart.net/
